com.ppm.integration.agilesdk.kpi

Class KpiImportIntegration

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ppm.integration.agilesdk.kpi.KpiImportIntegration
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FunctionIntegration

    public abstract class KpiImportIntegration
extends java.lang.Object
implements FunctionIntegration
    Main class of KPI Import Integration, used to import KPI values from external applications (agile tools or other).

    These integrations will be leveraged by the PPM "KPI Import Service".

    • Method Detail

      • getKpiValues

        public abstract java.util.Map<java.lang.Long,java.lang.Double> getKpiValues(ValueSet instanceConfiguration)
        This method will be invoked by PPM when retrieving the KPI values from this connector. It should return a new value for each KPI ID that should be updated. You should expect this to be called once per day, though the scheduling of the "KPI Import Service" can be modified to run less often (or more often, though this won't make much sense).

        You can check the date (and value) of the last registered value of a KPI ID with KpiProvider.getLatestKpiValue(Long), and decide based on this info whether or not to retrieve & submit a new value. There are may other methods to retrieve information on KPIs in class KpiProvider.
        Parameters:
        instanceConfiguration - the values of the configuration fields for the Connector
        Returns:
        A Map<Kpi ID, Kpi Value> of KPI values to insert in PPM.
        See Also:
        KpiProvider, Providers
